availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hezekiah G. Early (Caldwell co., kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Early and Rebecca George Early. Married to Mary F. Mitchusson Early in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1855. Father of Linn Early, James Early, and Alice Early. Student in Caldwell County in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Long Pond in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in trust for Rebecca Early in Long Pond in 1860.
